data.title: Kishore Kumar: Latest News, News Articles, Photos, Videos
data.meta_description: Find Latest News, Videos and Pictures about Kishore Kumar. Explore latest updates, news, information from NewsBytes. All about Kishore Kumar.
data.text:
15 Jun 2024

Bollywood

'Will always grieve': Mandira Bedi on late husband Raj Kaushal

In her first public discussion since the untimely death of her husband, Raj Kaushal on June 30, 2021, actor-television presenter Mandira Bedi has shared her experience of grief and loss.

06 Sep 2023

Bollywood

Ranbir Kapoor-Anurag Basu's Kishore Kumar biopic is happening: Report

Anurag Basu's Kishore Kumar biopic with Ranbir Kapoor has become a running joke in Bollywood as the movie has gone through several development hells.

25 Aug 2023

Shah Rukh Khan

Rajesh Khanna, SRK: No National Awards for celebrated artists

The National Film Awards celebrate the crème de la crème of Indian cinema and are regarded as India's top honor in cinematic excellence since films from across the nation are felicitated by the jury.

27 Feb 2023

Ranbir Kapoor

Ranbir Kapoor confirms working on singer Kishore Kumar's biopic soon

Ranbir Kapoor—who is gearing up for the release of Tu Jhooti Main Makkar—is already making headlines for his next projects.

06 Oct 2022

Virat Kohli

Watch: Virat Kohli converts Kishore Kumar's old bungalow into restaurant

Virat Kohli took his fans on a virtual tour of his new venture called the One8 Commune in Mumbai.

19 Jul 2022

Dilip Kumar

Confirmed! Biopic on Madhubala scheduled to be made next year

A biopic on the life of legendary yesteryear actor Madhubala is going into production soon.

27 Jun 2021

Bollywood

RD Burman birth anniversary: Celebrating Pancham Da and his music

Rahul Dev Burman or RD Burman was an artist like no other. Considered to be one of the most versatile and talented music directors this country has ever seen, he would have turned 82 today.

12 May 2021

Anu Malik

Amit Kumar expresses displeasure over 'Indian Idol-12' Kishore Kumar special

Indian Idol 12 managed to disappoint a lot of Kishore Kumar fans with their sub-par special on him.

21 Jan 2019

Rishi Kapoor

#TotalDhamaalTrailer: Ajay, Madhuri and Anil promise an adventurous laughter ride

2019 started off with the release of intense movies like Uri: The Surgical Strike and The Accidental Prime Minister. And now, it is time for viewers to relax and laugh.

19 Oct 2018

Celebrity

Statues of Kishore Kumar, SD Burman in Kolkata soon

If you're a fan of Kishore Kumar or SD Burman, you might want to visit Kolkata next as a fan club is going to install the statues of the music maestros in Kolkata next week.
